pullrequest.title: Model submission for X5 (Teambase) sensor configuration 1 from Sophisticated Engineering.

content.raw: @{5c0d82b3128c7106f57691a7} Is there an advantage to using this “Teambase” model instead of spawning another robot model, e.g., X3 config 1, which could be kept in the staging area \(other than assumed lower cost\)?
content.html: @Sophisticated Engineering Is there an advantage to using this “Teambase” model instead of spawning another robot model, e.g., X3 config 1, which could be kept in the staging area (other than assumed lower cost)?
